row.process:
:SET &runid# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() !:SET &CLIENT#=FORMAT("&CLIENTNR#","0000")
:PRINT "" :PRINT " Type audit &TYPE_AUDIT# Début Audit &DATETIME_BEGIN# Fin Audit &DATETIME_END# Client &CLIENT#" :PRINT "" :PRINT " Fichier généré &AUDIT_FILE#" :PRINT ""
:SET &dateext# = STR_CUT(&DATETIME_BEGIN#,1,10) :SET &datedeb# = CONV_DATE("YYYY-MM-DD:&dateext#","YYYYMMDD") :SET &heureext# = STR_CUT(&DATETIME_BEGIN#,12,8) :SET &heuredeb# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&heureext#,":","")
:SET &dateext# = STR_CUT(&DATETIME_END#,1,10) :SET &datefin# = CONV_DATE("YYYY-MM-DD:&dateext#","YYYYMMDD") :SET &heureext# = STR_CUT(&DATETIME_END#,12,8) :SET &heurefin# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&heureext#,":","")
:PRINT " Début Audit &datedeb# Fin Audit &datefin# Client &CLIENT#"
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" cd &PATH_UTILITY# if not exist "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" ( mkdir "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" ) set rc=0
echo ************************************* echo Exécution de l'Audit Manuel : echo ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENT# -F&TYPE_AUDIT# -O&AUDIT_FILE# -D1&datedeb#&heuredeb# -D2&datefin#&heurefin# echo ************************************* echo. ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENT# -F&TYPE_AUDIT# -O&AUDIT_FILE# -D1&datedeb#&heuredeb# -D2&datefin#&heurefin# set rc=%errorlevel%
@set retcode=%rc% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" cd &PATH_UTILITY# [[ -d "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#" ]] || mkdir "&PATH_AUDIT_REP#"
echo "*************************************" echo "Exécution de l'Audit Manuel :" echo "./ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENT# -F&TYPE_AUDIT# -O&AUDIT_FILE# -D1&datedeb#&heuredeb# -D2&datefin#&heurefin#" echo "*************************************" echo "" ./ucybdbrr -V -B -LE -C&CLIENT# -F&TYPE_AUDIT# -O&AUDIT_FILE# -D1&datedeb#&heuredeb# -D2&datefin#&heurefin# rc=$? exit $rc :OTHER
:ENDSWITCH

row.pre_process: :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# !:INC JOBI.CLIENT_WITHOUT_AUDIT, NOFOUND=IGNORE :INC JOBI.UNIX_SHELL, NOFOUND=IGNORE !:INC JOBI.ALIAS, NOFOUND=IGNORE
